resources.description: A list of bug bounty write-up that is categorized by the bug nature

resources.description: Setup scripts for security tools

resources.description: Default passwords for many devices and services

resources.description: Forensics tips and tools

resources.name: Guifre
resources.description: Security, system and network cheatsheets

resources.name: GTFOBins
resources.description: Curated list/cheatsheet of Unix binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions, obtain shells, read files

resources.name: Hack Tricks
resources.description: Guide and cheatsheet for pentesting: shell, linux exploitation, windows exploitation, mobile app pentesting, network pentesting, web pentesting, binary exploit, forensics, crypto, backdoor, etc.

resources.name: HTML5 Security Cheatsheet
resources.description: XSS vector making use of HTML5, HTML4, CSS, DOM, UFT7, SVG, JSON, etc ...

resources.name: LOLBAS
resources.description: Living Off The Land Binaries and Scripts; Curated list/cheatsheet of Windows binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions, obtain shells, read files

resources.name: Malware Traffic Analysis
resources.description: Malware traffic analysis blog and pastebin posts with pcap and malware samples attached; traffic analysis exercises

resources.name: MD5 maxmin record
resources.description: Collection of various extremes of MD5 hashes

resources.name: MDN - Event reference
resources.description: DOM Events reference, useful for XSS

resources.name: PayloadsAllTheThings
resources.description: A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF

resources.name: Portswigger - XSS cheat sheet
resources.description: XSS cheat sheet containing many vectors that can help bypassing WAFs and filters

resources.name: Privacy Tools
resources.description: Website that provides knowledge and tools to protect your privacy against global mass surveillance

resources.name: PTES
resources.description: The penetration testing execution standard covers all steps related to a penetration test

resources.name: Red Teaming Tactics and Techniques
resources.description: Exploring Red Teaming tactics and techniques, some of the common offensive security techniques involving gaining code execution, lateral movement, persistence and more

resources.name: RubyFu
resources.description: Offensive Ruby book

resources.name: SecLists
resources.description: Collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place; include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, etc.

resources.name: Security Certification Roadmap
resources.description: Map referencing all security certifications existing in several categories: Implementation, Architecture, Management, Analysis, Defensive Operations, Offensive Operations

resources.description: List of SSL/TLS checks that can be performed manually with OpenSSL or a web browser

resources.name: StegOnline checklist
resources.description: CTF Image Steganography Checklist

resources.name: The Bug Hunter's Methodology
resources.description: A collection of tips, tricks, tools, analysis and notes related to web application security assessments and more specifically towards bug hunting in bug bounties

resources.name: Vergilius
resources.description: A collection of Microsoft Windows kernel structures, unions and enumerations; most of them are not officially documented and cannot be found in Windows Driver Kit (WDK) headers

resources.name: VRT
resources.description: Bugcrowd Vulnerability Rating Taxonomy (VRT) provides a baseline vulnerability priority scale for bug hunters and organizations

resources.name: XSS Payloads
